description: Elgyem, known as the Cerebral or Brain Pokémon, is an extraterrestrial Pokémon. It is based on greys. It has an egg-shaped head, which is as big as the remaining part of its body. It has two green-colored eyes, and black, symmetrical patterns on its head. It stands on two legs, and has two hands, on which there are Red, Green, & Yellow colored three fingers. Its legs are short & it has a small, fat tail. It uses strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent`s brain, causing unbearable headaches. This Pokémon had never been seen until it appeared from far in the desert 50 years ago. Since then, they live in their Celestial Tower in Unova. The name is taken from "LGM", a term commonly used to describe aliens.
name: Ligray
